WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed due to no additional information.
WorkItem.Description:
I load my character in from the armory. I choose quite a few items to compare. I run the optimizer (multiple thoroughnesses) and get the following error:
Â 
************** Exception Text **************
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.

Comments.Message: It appears that if you check at least one buff, this exception no longer occurs
Disregard my last comment.  It still occurs if you attempt to optimize for overall, but not for sustained or burst
Please attach your character file that reproduces this. Also, it looks like you may have cut off the rest of the exception text?

I just ran it again using the attached character, optimizing for overall, overriding regem and reenchant.  Here's the exception in full.

OK, thanks, we'll take a look.

I certainly hope you can't reproduce it =D

It was a bug in 2.1.1 that was taken care of in 2.1.2.  Thanks for closing it out though =D
